{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3278965,"name":"Bruno Osio","username":"Brunoo1103","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/b/dc4da7/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-01-10T00:19:27.425Z","cooked":"

Hi, we are a team from Brazil which needs MA3 encoders, just like the photo below, for our MK2 Swerve Drive

Screenshot_2024-01-09-21-11-57-129_com.android.chrome1080×2400 195 KB

If you don’t use It anymore on our robot and would like to sell It, we would be grateful (call me on my email: osiobruno716@gmail.com or send me a message)
